title: Implement user authentication system
description: Create a secure authentication system with JWT tokens, password hashing, and session management for the application.

title: Design responsive navigation component
description: Create a mobile-first navigation component that works across all device sizes with smooth animations and accessibility features.

title: Test login functionality across browsers
description: Comprehensive testing of the login system across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers including edge cases and error scenarios.

title: Define API endpoints documentation
description: Create comprehensive API documentation including request/response examples, error codes, and authentication requirements.

title: Optimize database queries for performance
description: Analyze and optimize slow database queries, add proper indexing, and implement query caching where appropriate.

title: Create automated test suite for payment flow
description: Develop comprehensive automated tests for the entire payment process including success scenarios, failures, and edge cases.

title: Review security compliance requirements
description: Audit current security measures against GDPR, SOC2, and industry standards. Prepare compliance documentation.

title: Implement dark mode theme
description: Add dark mode support to the application with smooth transitions and user preference persistence.

title: Test mobile app performance on low-end devices
description: Performance testing on Android and iOS devices with limited RAM and processing power to ensure smooth user experience.

title: Setup CI/CD pipeline for automated deployments
description: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing, building, and deployment to staging and production environments.

title: Create user onboarding flow wireframes
description: Design wireframes for a streamlined user onboarding process that reduces drop-off rates and improves user activation.

title: Implement real-time notifications system
description: Build a WebSocket-based notification system for real-time updates with fallback to polling for older browsers.
